name: Defre
description: I have come to terms with the simple fact that those right and special people we seek and desire might not be as close as we want them to be and till we are willing to accept that fact and look beyond were we seek we might never find that special soul mate,i am new to this and am here to seek for that lover and best friend, recently came across an old friend that wanted me to try this online dating out cos he met his wife from an online site so i am trying this out and dont have a problem with what ever region or country i find her i know that we both can make it work, if you think you are that soul mate i seek hit me up and we can get started as friends.
